letters.description: Establishing a safe, non-judgmental space to facilitate open communication regarding end-of-life fears and desires.
Identifying the physical, emotional, and spiritual needs to curate a peaceful and personalized environment.
Guiding the client through life review and the creation of meaningful projects to honor their life story.
Ensuring the client's end-of-life wishes and advance directives are documented and respected by all parties.
Implementing non-medical comfort measures and holistic rituals to alleviate anxiety and promote tranquility.
Providing continuous vigil support during the active dying phase and facilitating sacred after-death care.
